---
node_id: 4
title: Load Directory Script (4)
---
### The `load directory.py` script performs three functions: loading markdown files, vector files from ChromaDB, and transcript history.

The `load directory.py` script is intended to perform three functions: first, to load markdown files, second, to load vector files from the ChromaDB database, and third, to load the transcript history.
